clean_data: Systems Administrator span lSystemsspan span lAdministratorspan Monroe MI Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Systems Administrator Monroe County Monroe MI February 2014 to Present Monroe MI At the County of Monroe I provide all tiers of support for all branches of local government including the local cities villages townships policefire departments 911 dispatch center county jail District and Circuit courts and wastewaterwater filtration plants A short list of job functions would include but are not limited to administration of the Windows Server environment AD DHCP DNS GPO SQL etc VMWare private LANWLAN PBX systems web services G Suite formerly Google Apps paperless workflow products including Hyland Onbase and Laserfiche and digital court recording I also provide support and administer all branches of public safety software in accordance with FBI CJIS policy as well as design and implement invehicle mobile systems for police fire and EMS In addition to the technical side of the job I also assist in technology planning design and implementation as well as assist in purchasing various technologies I also am tasked with project management for technology implementation around the County of Monroe Education Associate in Information Systems Henry Ford Community College Dearborn MI January 2010 to May 2013 Skills System Administrator System Admin Vmware Active Directory
